caption.text: The post-processing treatments applied in the current study.

cell.text: L-PBF Ti6Al4V with a diamond unit cell of 1.5 mm.

statement.text: There are some empty blocks to be filled in the table.
Chemical etching (CE2) takes 25min in an ultrasonic bath.
As-processed (AP) is having L-PBF Ti6Al4V with a diamond unit cell of 120 mm.
There are 3 post-processing treatments applied in the current study.
The details of the post-processing parameters used in the current study are presented in Table 3 .
